title: Holor (ℍ)
description: Defines the holarchic mathematical operator — a multidimensional transformation field uniting holons within the epistemic lattice.

signature.description: Unique holor signature (ℍₙ) corresponding to its holarchic layer or lattice index.

rank.description: Dimensional order of the holor (scalar, vector, tensor, etc.).

domain.description: The holon (ℋ) or set of holons upon which this holor acts.

operator.description: Functional operator associated with the holor (e.g., ∇ℍ, Λ, ℛ).

components.description: Constituent holons or sub-holors composing the holor.

transformations.description: Allowed morphisms or reflexive operations within the holor’s manifold.
